text:
If you’re expecting a little one and/or are just looking for ways to save on various baby items (including high chairs, diapers, clothing, toys and more!), here’s a round-up of this week’s best Baby Deals that are still available to snag!
*Top Baby Deal of the Week* Hurry over to Walmart.com to request a FREE Baby Welcome Box . Simply click on the box that states “ Welcome Box – Sign Up Now ” and fill out the form. Even sweeter, this box ships for FREE! Please allow up to five weeks for delivery of your free sample.
GO HERE for more details! 

BEST ONLINE BABY DEALS If you’re an Amazon Family member (it’s free to sign up with Prime Membership – just go here ) you automatically save an additional 20% off your diapers purchase when you choose Subscribe & Save!

If you’re expecting a little one, be sure to create a FREE Amazon Baby Registry ! You’ll be able to easily add products to your registry, including toys, books, DVDs, music and more – making it easy for friends and family members to shop for you. GO HERE to get started.

Only $12.32 shipped after Subscribe & Save

Save 30% off your first order of select Amazon Elements Baby Wipes

Earth’s Best Organic Stage 1 – My First Veggies Variety Pack, 12-count

TWO Advil Infants’ Ibuprofen Dye-Free White Grape Flavor 50mg Concentrated Drops 
Only $6.57shipped when you opt to Subscribe & Save!
NOTE , if you have 5 or more subscriptions arriving in a month, you’ll save a whopping 15% off this order instead of the regular 5% – which will sweeten this deal! Remember, when you sign up for Subscribe and Save, you are under NO obligation whatsoever and can cancel at anytime. To cancel or modify your Subscribe and Save items, just click on “my account” and then “subscriptions” and then you can cancel and/or modify anything you want.

The Honest Company is offering 2 FREE Trials which will contain a travel size Honest Shampoo & Body Wash, Multi-Surface Cleaner, Face & Body Lotion, Healing Balm, Hand Soap, plus 7 diapers and 10 wipes. Shipping starts at $5.95 or is free on orders of $50 or more and on the diapers bundle .

BabyLeggings.com is offering Hip2Save readers 5 pairs of adorable Baby Leggings for just $14.99 shipped (regularly $10 per pair) with the exclusive promo code HIP2SAVEBABY at checkout!

BEST IN-STORE BABY DEALS Target (Thru 2/25):

This week there is a FREE $5 Target Gift Card with select baby department purchase of $25 or more coupon available in the ad! You can also find this coupon on the Cartwheel app OR by texting DIAPER to 827438 to have it delivered to your smartphone. This offer is also available online at Target.com and includes diapers, wipes and training pants.
Huggies Deal Idea #1: 
Buy 3 Huggies Snug & Dry jumbo pack diapers $7.99 each
Buy 1 Huggies wipes 72ct $1.97
Total = $25.94
Scan the FREE $5 Target Gift Card with select baby department purchase of $25 or more coupon found in the ad, on the Cartwheel app OR by texting DIAPER to 827438 
And use three $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable printable coupons (will need access to 2 computers) 
And use the $1.50/1 Huggies Wipes when you buy Little Snugglers or Movers Diapers coupon found in the 2/5 SS (exp 2/25)
Pay $15.44
Get back a FREE $5 Target Gift Card (for scanning above coupon)
Final cost $10.44 total for all 4 items!

Huggies Deal Idea #1: 
Buy 3 Huggies Snug & Dry jumbo pack diapers $7.99 each

Buy 1 Kandoo Wipes Tub 50 ct $1.99 (sale thru 3/4)
Total = $25.96
Scan the FREE $5 Target Gift Card with select baby department purchase of $25 or more coupon found in the ad, on the Cartwheel app OR by texting DIAPER to 827438 
And use three $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable printable coupons (will need access to 2 computers) 
And use the $1/1 Kandoo Flushable Wipes printable coupon 
Pay $15.86
Get back a FREE $5 Target Gift Card (for scanning above coupon)
Final cost $10.86 total – like paying $3.65 per diaper pack and getting FREE wipes!

Pampers Deal Idea: 
Buy 1 Pampers Baby Dry super pack diapers $24.99
Scan the FREE $5 Target Gift Card with select baby department purchase of $25 or more coupon found in the ad, on the Cartwheel app OR by texting DIAPER to 827438 
And use the $2/1 Pampers Baby Dry Diapers printable coupon
Pay $22.99
Get back a FREE $5 Target Gift Card (for scanning above coupon)
Final cost $17.99!
Walgreens (Thru 2/25) 

The First Years Hard Spout 2-Pack $6.99 
Use the $2/1 The First Years Sippy Cup 2-Pack printable coupon 
Final cost $4.99, just $2.50 per sippy cup!
CVS (Thru 2/25) 
Spend $30 on Jumbo Pk. Huggies, Pull-Ups, GoodNites, Tru-Fit Refills or Wipes = $10 EB (limit 1) 
Deal Scenario: 
Buy 4 Huggies Snug & Dry Diapers Jumbo Pack $11.49
Minus Buy 1 Get 1 50% off – $34.47
Use four $3/1 Huggies Diapers (excluding 9 ct or less) printable coupons 
Pay $22.47
Get back $10 EB
Final cost $12.47 – just $3.12 each!
PRINTABLE BABY COUPONS $2/1 The First Years Insulated Hard Spout Designer Sippy Cup, 2-Pack $0.75/2 Gerber Cereal products $5/2 bottles of Enfamil Enfalyte 32oz $3/1 bottle of Enfamil Enfalyte 32oz $3/1 package of HUGGIES Diapers (Not valid on 9 ct. or less) $1/4 Gerber 1st Foods, 2nd Foods, or 3rd Foods $0.75/2 Gerber Cereal products $2/1 Balmex Diaper Rash Cream, 2oz, 4oz or 16oz $2/1 HUGGIES Diapers (Not valid on 9 ct or less) $2/1 Playtex Nurser Drop-Ins Liners 4 oz or 8 oz, 50 or 100 ct $2/1 Playtex Bottle, 1 pk, 3 pk, 5 pk, or Gift Set $2/1 Playtex Cups, 1 pk or 2 pk $0.50/1 HUGGIES Wipes, 56 ct or higher $1/3 Gerber Graduates Puffs, Lil’ Crunchies, or Yogurt Melts items $1.50/1 package of HUGGIES Wipes, 336 ct or higher $1/6 Gerber Grabbers or Organic Pouches $1/1 Luvs Diapers (excludes trial/travel size) $2/1 Pampers Baby Dry Diapers (excludes trial/travel size) $2/1 Pampers Swaddlers Diapers (excludes trial/travel size) 25¢/1 Pampers Wipes 56 ct or higher (excludes trial/travel size) $2/1 Pampers Cruisers Diapers (excludes trial/travel size) $2/1 Pamper Easy Ups Training Underwear (excludes trial/travel size) $1.50/1 Pampers UnderJams Absorbent Night Wear (excludes trial) 

Did you know that the average cost of a baby’s first year is around $7,000 – excluding medical costs? If you’re expecting a little one and are wondering what stores offer the best perks for baby registries, check out these top five places to register. See all of them here .

AND, if you’re looking for TONS of baby-related freebies, be sure to check out this post ! PLUS, check out this post to see the top 10 useful baby products for new parents .
